title: SHOW TELEMETRY EVENT DEFINITIONS | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
The Snowflake Native App Framework is generally available on supported cloud platforms. For additional information, see
Support for private connectivity, VPS, and government regions.
Lists the event definitions for the specified app.

Specifies the identifier for the app. If the identifier contains
spaces, special characters, or mixed-case characters, the entire string must be enclosed
in double quotes. Identifiers enclosed in double quotes are also case-sensitive.
Shows information about the event definitions for an app.

The name of the event definition. Event definition names begin with the
SNOWFLAKE$ prefix.

The type of event definition. See Define event definitions in the manifest file of an app for more
information.
Specifies if the event definition is MANDATORY or OPTIONAL.
Specifies if the event definition is enabled in the consumer account.
